df-grp
blocks.content: Define class of all groups. A group is a monoid ( ~ df-mnd ) whose internal operation is such that every element admits a left inverse (which can be proven to be a two-sided inverse). Thus, a group ` G ` is an algebraic structure formed from a base set of elements (notated ` ( Base `` G ) ` per ~ df-base ) and an internal group operation (notated ` ( +g `` G ) ` per ~ df-plusg ). The operation combines any two elements of the group base set and must satisfy the 4 group axioms: closure (the result of the group operation must always be a member of the base set, see ~ grpcl ), associativity (so ` ( ( a +g b ) +g c ) = ( a +g ( b +g c ) ) ` for any a, b, c, see ~ grpass ), identity (there must be an element ` e = ( 0g `` G ) ` such that ` e +g a = a +g e = a ` for any a), and inverse (for each element a in the base set, there must be an element ` b = invg a ` in the base set such that ` a +g b = b +g a = e ` ). It can be proven that the identity element is unique ( ~ grpideu ). Groups need not be commutative; a commutative group is an Abelian group (see ~ df-abl ). Subgroups can often be formed from groups, see ~ df-subg . An example of an (Abelian) group is the set of complex numbers ` CC ` over the group operation ` + ` (addition), as proven in ~ cnaddablx ; an Abelian group is a group as proven in ~ ablgrp . Other structures include groups, including unital rings ( ~ df-ring ) and fields ( ~ df-field ). (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: isgrp
blocks.content: The predicate "is a group." (This theorem demonstrates the use of symbols as variable names, first proposed by FL in 2010.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cgrp, cmnd, wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  rexeqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0g)
  df-grp(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnd)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)))), d(s1, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cgrp, cmnd, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)=(0 ` hs0))))
  raleqbidv(s0, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)=(0 ` hs0)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3))
  rexeqbidv(s1, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, (s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)=(0 ` hs0), (s1[c2]s0)= c3)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  eqeq12d((s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0), (0 ` hs0), (s1[c2]s0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s1, (+ ` hs0), s0, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c2, (+ ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)
  syl6eqr((0 ` hs0), c3, (0 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c0g)
  df-grp(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnd)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: grpmnd
blocks.content: A group is a monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpmnd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cmnd))
} = {
  simplbi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))))
  isgrp(hs1, hs0, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpmnd(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
} = {
  simplbi(c0 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà Mnd, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(0 ` c0))))
  isgrp(hs1, hs0, c0, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
}

blocks.name: grpinvex
blocks.content: Every member of a group has a left inverse. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4)), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), c4))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), c4))), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  isgrp(hs0, s0, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), c4)), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4)))
  rexbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), c4), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), c4, co(cv(s0), c3, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c3]c1)= c4))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c3]c1)= c4), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c3]hs0)= c4)))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà Grp, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c3]hs0)= c4)), c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  isgrp(hs0, s0, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c3]hs0)= c4), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c3]c1)= c4))
  rexbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c1, (s0[c3]hs0)= c4, (s0[c3]c1)= c4)
  eqeq1d((s0[c3]hs0), c4, (s0[c3]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, s0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c3]c1)= c4))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: grpideu
blocks.content: The two-sided identity element of a group is unique. Lemma 2.2.1(a) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpideu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  grpmnd(c0)
  mndideu(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpideu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))), c3 =(0 ` c0))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))), d(s1, c3))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Grp, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))), c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  grpmnd(c0)
  mndideu(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: grpplusf
blocks.content: The group addition operation is a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: grpplusfo
blocks.content: The group addition operation is a function onto the base set/set of group elements. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-2006.) (Revised by AV, 30-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: resgrpplusfrn
blocks.content: The underlying set of a group operation which is a restriction of a structure. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Mar-2008.) (Revised by AV, 30-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm resgrpplusfrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, crn(c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c4, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusf, c0))
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, crn(c3)), wfo(c3, cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2)), wfo(c3, cxp(c1, c1), c1), wfo(c3, cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2), wfo(c3, cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  grpplusfo(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  foeq123d(c3, cxp(c1, c1), c1, c3, cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2)))
  eqidd(c3, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2)))
  sqxpeqd(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wss(c1, c2), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ressbas2(c1, c2, c0, c4)
  eqcomd(c1, crn(c3), wfo(c3, cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  forn(c3, cxp(c1, c1), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resgrpplusfrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí c1 = ran(c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c4[|`s]c1)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+f ` c0)
} = {
  syl((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c1 = ran(c3), (c3 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü† c1))
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü† c1), (c3 :((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚Ü†(Base ` c0)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚äÜ c2, (c3 :((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0))‚Ü†(Base ` c0)))
  grpplusfo(c0, c3, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  foeq123d(c3, (c1 √ó c1), c1, c3, ((Base ` c0)√ó(Base ` c0)), (Base ` c0), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  eqidd(c3, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  sqxpeqd(c1, (Base ` c0), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c1 =(Base ` c0))
  ressbas2(c1, c2, c0, c4)
  eqcomd(c1, ran(c3), (c3 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Ü† c1))
  forn(c3, (c1 √ó c1), c1)
}

blocks.name: grppropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a group iff the other one is. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grppropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(c1, cmnd), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))))
  mndpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3bitr3d(w0, wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))), wral(s1, c2, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wral(s1, c2, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))))
  ralbidva(s1, c2, w0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))))
  rexbidva(s0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  anass1rs(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  raleqbidv(s1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  rexeqdv(s0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  raleqbidv(s1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))))
  rexeqdv(s0, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  isgrp(s1, s0, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  isgrp(s1, s0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grppropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà Grp))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà Grp, (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)))), (c1 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)))))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ‚àà Mnd, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))), c1 ‚àà Mnd, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))))
  mndpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3bitr3d(w0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))))
  ralbidva(s1, c2, w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)))
  rexbidva(s0, c2, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0), (s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))
  anass1rs(w0, s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c2, ((s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)‚Üî(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)))
  eqeq12d((s0[(+ ` c0)]s1), (0 ` c0), (s0[(+ ` c1)]s1), (0 ` c1), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))
  adantr(w0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), (0 ` c0)=(0 ` c1))
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  raleqbidv(s1, c2, (Base ` c0), w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)))
  rexeqdv(s0, c2, (Base ` c0), w0, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))
  raleqbidv(s1, c2, (Base ` c1), w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)))
  rexeqdv(s0, c2, (Base ` c1), w0, (s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))
  isgrp(s1, s0, c0, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  isgrp(s1, s0, c1, (Base ` c1), (+ ` c1), (0 ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, s1 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: grpprop
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a group iff the other one is. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpprop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
} = {
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
  grppropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpprop(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c1)
} = {
  mptru((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà Grp))
  grppropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, (Base ` c0), wtru)
  eqidd((Base ` c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  a1i((T ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))
  oveqi(hs0, (+ ` c0), hs1, (+ ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

blocks.name: grppropstr
blocks.content: Generalize a specific 2-element group ` L ` to show that any set ` K ` with the same (relevant) properties is also a group. (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grppropstr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c2)
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)
  -| wceq(c1, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)))
} = {
  grpprop(c0, c1)
  eqtri(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), c2)
  ax-mp(wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  eqeltrri(c2, universe, cfv(cbs, c0))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  grpbase(c2, universe, c1, c3)
  eqtri(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), c3)
  ax-mp(wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  eqeltrri(c3, universe, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  grpplusg(c3, universe, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grppropstr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (Base ` c0)= c2
  ‚ä£ (+ ` c0)= c3
  ‚ä£ c1 = { <(Base ` ndx), c2 >, <(+ ` ndx), c3 > }
} = {
  grpprop(c0, c1)
  eqtri((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c2)
  ax-mp(c2 =(Base ` c1), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltrri(c2, universe, (Base ` c0))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  grpbase(c2, universe, c1, c3)
  eqtri((+ ` c0), (+ ` c1), c3)
  ax-mp(c3 =(+ ` c1), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltrri(c3, universe, (+ ` c0))
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  grpplusg(c3, universe, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: grpss
blocks.content: Show that a structure extending a constructed group (e.g., a ring) is also a group. This allows us to prove that a constructed potential ring ` R ` is a group before we know that it is also a ring. (Theorem ~ ringgrp , on the other hand, requires that we know in advance that ` R ` is a ring.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wss(c0, c1)
  -| wfun(c1)
} = {
  bicomi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  grpprop(c1, c0)
  strss(cbs, c1, c0, c2)
  baseid()
  eleqtrri(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)))
  prid1(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3))
  opex(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2)
  strss(cplusg, c1, c0, c3)
  plusgid()
  eleqtrri(cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)))
  prid2(cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2))
  opex(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c2 >, <(+ ` ndx), c3 > }
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚äÜ c1
  ‚ä£ Fun(c1)
} = {
  bicomi(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà Grp)
  grpprop(c1, c0)
  strss(cbs, c1, c0, c2)
  baseid()
  eleqtrri(<(Base ` ndx), c2 >, c0, { <(Base ` ndx), c2 >, <(+ ` ndx), c3 > })
  prid1(<(Base ` ndx), c2 >, <(+ ` ndx), c3 >)
  opex((Base ` ndx), c2)
  strss(cplusg, c1, c0, c3)
  plusgid()
  eleqtrri(<(+ ` ndx), c3 >, c0, { <(Base ` ndx), c2 >, <(+ ` ndx), c3 > })
  prid2(<(+ ` ndx), c3 >, <(Base ` ndx), c2 >)
  opex((+ ` ndx), c3)
}

blocks.name: isgrpd2e
blocks.content: Deduce a group from its properties. In this version of ~ isgrpd2 , we don't assume there is an expression for the inverse of ` x ` . (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isgrpd2e(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp)), diffsc(s1, c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, c0)))))
  mpbid(w0, wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  raleqbidv(s0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  rexeqbidv(s1, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, c0), w0)
  oveqd(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), w0)
  isgrp(s0, s1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isgrpd2e(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(+ ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(0 ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp), d(s1, c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà Mnd, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s1[(+ ` c0)]s0)=(0 ` c0))))
  mpbid(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s1[(+ ` c0)]s0)=(0 ` c0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3))
  raleqbidv(s0, c1, (Base ` c0), w0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s1[(+ ` c0)]s0)=(0 ` c0)))
  rexeqbidv(s1, c1, (Base ` c0), w0, (s1[c2]s0)= c3, (s1[(+ ` c0)]s0)=(0 ` c0))
  eqeq12d((s1[c2]s0), c3, (s1[(+ ` c0)]s0), (0 ` c0), w0)
  oveqd(s1, c2, s0, (+ ` c0), w0)
  isgrp(s0, s1, c0, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: isgrpd2
blocks.content: Deduce a group from its properties. ` N ` (negative) is normally dependent on ` x ` i.e. read it as ` N ( x ) ` . Note: normally we don't use a ` ph ` antecedent on hypotheses that name structure components, since they can be eliminated with ~ eqid , but we make an exception for theorems such as ~ isgrpd2 , ~ ismndd , and ~ islmodd since theorems using them often rewrite the structure components. (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isgrpd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  isgrpd2e(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c4, c1), wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  rspcev(hs0, c4, c1, wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c4, c2, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isgrpd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(+ ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(0 ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c4 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c4[c2]s0)= c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  isgrpd2e(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(hs0[c2]s0)= c3), c4 ‚àà c1, (c4[c2]s0)= c3)
  rspcev(hs0, c4, c1, (c4[c2]s0)= c3, (hs0[c2]s0)= c3)
  eqeq1d((hs0[c2]s0), c3, (c4[c2]s0), hs0 = c4)
  oveq1(hs0, c4, c2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w((c4[c2]s0)= c3)
}

blocks.name: isgrpde

thm isgrpde(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))

  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))

  -| diffss(s1, s2)

thm isgrpde(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(+ ` c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1))‚Üí((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)))

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {

thm isgrpd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

  rspcev(s1, c4, c1, wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))

thm isgrpi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wcel(c0, cgrp)

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| wcel(c3, c1)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c3, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  mptru(wcel(c0, cgrp))
  isgrpd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1))
  adantl(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(c3, c1))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c3, c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(c4, c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: grpsgrp

blocks.name: dfgrp2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a group as semigroup with a left identity and a left inverse for each element. This "definition" is weaker than ~ df-grp , based on the definition of a monoid which provides a left and a right identity. (Contributed by AV, 28-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: dfgrp2e
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a group as a set with a closed, associative operation, a left identity and a left inverse for each element. Alternate definition in [Lang] p. 7. (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2006.) (Revised by AV, 28-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfgrp2e(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s4, c1, wceq(co(cv(s4), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s4, c1, wceq(co(cv(s4), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))))), wa(wcel(c0, csgrp), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s4, c1, wceq(co(cv(s4), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))))))
  dfgrp2(s3, s0, s4, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32ri(wcel(c0, csgrp), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s4, c1, wceq(co(cv(s4), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s3)))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))))
  syl(wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s4, c1, wceq(co(cv(s4), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s3)))))), wb(wcel(c0, csgrp), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  rexlimiv(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s4, c1, wceq(co(cv(s4), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  a1d(wcel(cv(s3), c1), wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s4, c1, wceq(co(cv(s4), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(cv(s3), c1), wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, universe))
  ax-1(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cv(s3), c1))
  syl(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wi(wcel(cv(s3), c1), wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), emptycls))
  fvprc(c0, cbs)
  syl5bi(wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s3), c1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cv(s3), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  eleq2i(cv(s3), c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl6bi(wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s3), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cv(s3), emptycls))
  eleq2(cfv(cbs, c0), emptycls, cv(s3))
  pm2.21i(wcel(cv(s3), emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  noel(cv(s3))
  issgrpv(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s3)
}

thm dfgrp2e(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s4[c2]s0)= s3))))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, c2)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà Grp, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s4[c2]s0)= s3))))), (c0 ‚àà SGrp ‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s4[c2]s0)= s3))))))
  dfgrp2(s3, s0, s4, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32ri(c0 ‚àà SGrp, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s4[c2]s0)= s3)))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)))))))
  syl(‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s4[c2]s0)= s3)))), (c0 ‚àà SGrp ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  rexlimiv(s3, c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s4[c2]s0)= s3))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1d(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà c1,(s4[c2]s0)= s3))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  pm2.61i((s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ùïå), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ax-1(c0 ‚àà ùïå, s3 ‚àà c1)
  syl(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, (s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ùïå), (Base ` c0)= ‚àÖ)
  fvprc(c0, cbs)
  syl5bi((Base ` c0)= ‚àÖ, s3 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà ùïå, s3 ‚àà(Base ` c0))

}

blocks.name: isgrpix
blocks.content: Properties that determine a group. Read ` N ` as ` N ( x ) ` . Note: This theorem has hard-coded structure indices for demonstration purposes. It is not intended for general use. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm isgrpix(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wcel(c0, cgrp)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(nat1, c1), cop(nat2, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1))

thm isgrpix(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà Grp
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c0 = { < 1, c1 >, < 2, c2 > }
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà c1
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c3[c2]s0)= s0)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c4[c2]s0)= c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  isgrpi(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  grpbasex(c1, c0, c2)
  grpplusgx(c2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: grpidcl
blocks.content: The identity element of a group belongs to the group. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: grpbn0
blocks.content: The base set of a group is not empty. (Contributed by Szymon Jaroszewicz, 3-Apr-2007.)

blocks.name: grplid
blocks.content: The identity element of a group is a left identity. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: grprid
blocks.content: The identity element of a group is a right identity. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: grpn0
blocks.content: A group is not empty. (Contributed by Szymon Jaroszewicz, 3-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)

thm grprcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c1[c5]c4)=(c3[c5]c4)‚Üî c1 = c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  impbid1((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c1[c5]c4)=(c3[c5]c4), c1 = c3)
  rexlimddv(hs0, c2, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[c5]c4)=(c3[c5]c4)‚Üí c1 = c3), (hs0[c5]c4)=(0 ` c0))
  3ad2antr3(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(hs0[c5]c4)=(0 ` c0)))
  grpinvex(hs0, c0, c4, c2, c5, (0 ` c0))

blocks.name: grpinveu
blocks.content: The left inverse element of a group is unique. Lemma 2.2.1(b) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.)

thm grpinveu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wreu(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wreu(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))

  grpinvex(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  reximdva(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  ancld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimdva(hs0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  expd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  an32s(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c1), c4)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  imp41(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c1), c4)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))

  eqtr3(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c4, co(cv(hs0), c3, c1))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs0.w((s0[c3]c1)= c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (hs0[c3]c1), c4)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c3, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: grpid
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that an element of a group is the identity element. Provides a convenient way to compute the value of the identity element. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1), wceq(c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  syl5rbb(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1), wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c1, c4))
  eqcom(c4, c1)
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c4), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c4, c3, c1)))
  imp(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(c1, c4)))
  pm2.43d(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(c1, c4)))
  mpid(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(c1, c4))), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  3exp2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(c1, c4)))
  grprcan(c0, c1, c2, c4, c1, c3)
  eqeq2d(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c4, c3, c1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  grplid(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((c1[c3]c1)= c1 ‚Üî c4 = c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  syl5rbb((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c1[c3]c1)= c1, c4 = c1, c1 = c4)
  eqcom(c4, c1)
  bitr3d((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c1 = c4, (c1[c3]c1)= c1, (c1[c3]c1)=(c4[c3]c1))
  imp(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c1[c3]c1)=(c4[c3]c1)‚Üî c1 = c4))
  pm2.43d(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c1[c3]c1)=(c4[c3]c1)‚Üî c1 = c4))
  mpid(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c1[c3]c1)=(c4[c3]c1)‚Üî c1 = c4)), c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  3exp2(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c1[c3]c1)=(c4[c3]c1)‚Üî c1 = c4))
  grprcan(c0, c1, c2, c4, c1, c3)
  eqeq2d((c1[c3]c1), (c4[c3]c1), c1, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  grplid(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: isgrpid2
blocks.content: Properties showing that an element ` Z ` is the identity element of a group. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isgrpid2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1)), wceq(c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1)), wceq(c4, c1))
  expimpd(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1), wceq(c4, c1))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1), wceq(c4, c1))
  grpid(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl5ibcom(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c4, c1), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c4, c3, c4), c4)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c4, c3, c4), c4))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(co(c4, c3, c4), c4), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  grplid(c0, c4, c2, c4, c3)
  anbi12d(wceq(c4, c1), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c4, c3, c4), c4), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1))
  eleq1(c4, c1, c2)
  eqeq12d(co(c4, c3, c4), c4, co(c1, c3, c1), c1, wceq(c4, c1))
  oveq12d(c4, c3, c4, c1, c1, wceq(c4, c1))
  id(wceq(c4, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isgrpid2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c1[c3]c1)= c1)‚Üî c4 = c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c1[c3]c1)= c1), c4 = c1)
  expimpd(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[c3]c1)= c1, c4 = c1)
  biimpd((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c1[c3]c1)= c1, c4 = c1)
  grpid(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl5ibcom(c0 ‚àà Grp, c4 = c1, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c1[c3]c1)= c1), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c4[c3]c4)= c4))
  jca(c0 ‚àà Grp, c4 ‚àà c2, (c4[c3]c4)= c4)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c4[c3]c4)= c4, c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  grplid(c0, c4, c2, c4, c3)
  anbi12d(c4 = c1, c4 ‚àà c2, (c4[c3]c4)= c4, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[c3]c1)= c1)
  eleq1(c4, c1, c2)
  eqeq12d((c4[c3]c4), c4, (c1[c3]c1), c1, c4 = c1)
  oveq12d(c4, c3, c4, c1, c1, c4 = c1)
  id(c4 = c1)
}

blocks.name: grpidd2
blocks.content: Deduce the identity element of a group from its properties. Useful in conjunction with ~ isgrpd . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpidd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqcomd(c0, cfv(c0g, c1), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c1), c0), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), c0), c0))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), c0), c0, co(c0, c3, c0), w0)
  oveqd(c0, c3, c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), w0)
  rspcdva(s0, c0, c2, w0, wceq(co(c0, c3, c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c0, c3, c0), c0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c0, c0, c3)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1), c0), c0), wceq(cfv(c0g, c1), c0)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c2, w0)
  grpid(c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, c3, c0), c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c3, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpidd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(0 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(+ ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c0[c3]s0)= s0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqcomd(c0, (0 ` c1), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (0 ` c1)= c0, (c0[(+ ` c1)]c0)= c0)
  eqtr3d((c0[(+ ` c1)]c0), c0, (c0[c3]c0), w0)
  oveqd(c0, c3, c0, (+ ` c1), w0)
  rspcdva(s0, c0, c2, w0, (c0[c3]c0)= c0, (c0[c3]s0)= s0)
  eqeq12d((c0[c3]s0), s0, (c0[c3]c0), c0, s0 = c0)
  oveq2(s0, c0, c0, c3)
  id(s0 = c0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, (c0[c3]s0)= s0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[(+ ` c1)]c0)= c0 ‚Üî(0 ` c1)= c0), c1 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà(Base ` c1))
  eleqtrd(c0, (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  grpid(c1, c0, (Base ` c1), (+ ` c1), (0 ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c0[c3]c0), c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c3, c0)
}

blocks.name: grpinvfval
blocks.content: The inverse function of a group. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cminusg, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))), cfv(cminusg, c4))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cminusg, c4), cmpt(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))), wcel(c4, universe))
  mptfvmpt(s0, hs0, c4, universe, cminusg, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)), cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), crio(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))))), cbs, c4)
  mpteq12dv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), crio(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))), c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  riotaeqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, cbs)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, cplusg)
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c0g, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c0g)
  df-minusg(hs0, s0, s1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cminusg, c4), cmpt(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))), cmpt(s0, emptycls, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))), wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cminusg, c4), cmpt(s0, emptycls, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  fvprc(c4, cminusg)
  mpt0(s0, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  mpteq1d(s0, c1, crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c4), wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  fvprc(c4, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(invg ` c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(c0 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), d(s1, c1))
  eqtri(c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), (invg ` c4))
  pm2.61i((invg ` c4)=(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  mptfvmpt(s0, hs0, c4, universe, cminusg, c1, iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3), (s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)=(0 ` hs0))), cbs, c4)
  mpteq12dv(s0, (Base ` hs0), iota(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)=(0 ` hs0)), c1, iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3), hs0 = c4)
  riotaeqbidv(s1, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c4, (s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)=(0 ` hs0), (s1[c2]s0)= c3)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, cbs)
  eqeq12d((s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0), (0 ` hs0), (s1[c2]s0), c3, hs0 = c4)
  oveqd(s1, (+ ` hs0), s0, c2, hs0 = c4)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c2, (+ ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, cplusg)
  syl6eqr((0 ` hs0), c3, (0 ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, c0g)
  df-minusg(hs0, s0, s1)
  eqtr4d((invg ` c4), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), (s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqr((invg ` c4), (s0 ‚àà ‚àÖ ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3)), emptycls, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c4, cminusg)
  mpt0(s0, iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3))
  mpteq1d(s0, c1, iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3), emptycls, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (Base ` c4), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c4, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(iota(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1[c2]s0)= c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

  simprr(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  grpass(c0, (c4 ` c1), c2, c1, c3, c5)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c6[c5]c3)= c3)
  grplid(c0, c3, c2, c6, c5)
  adantr((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c1[c5]c3)= c6, ((c4 ` c1)[c5]c6)=(c4 ` c1))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, ((c4 ` c1)[c5]c6)=(c4 ` c1))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c4 ` c1)[c5]c6)=(c4 ` c1), (c4 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)

}

blocks.content: The inverse of a group element expressed in terms of the identity element. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.)

thm grpinvid2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c3, c5, c1), c6)))

  impbida(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c3, c5, c1), c6))

  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c6, c5, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c4, c1)), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  grplid(c0, cfv(c4, c1), c2, c6, c5)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c5, c1), c6), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c1)), co(c6, c5, cfv(c4, c1))))
  oveq1(co(c3, c5, c1), c6, c5, cfv(c4, c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c5, c1), c6), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c1)), c3))
  3eqtrd(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c1)), c3, co(c3, c5, co(c1, c5, cfv(c4, c1))), co(c3, c5, c6), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3impb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c1)), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c5, cfv(c4, c1)))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c1)), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c5, cfv(c4, c1)))), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2)))

thm isgrpinv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí(((c1 : c2 ‚Üí c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c1 ` s0)[c3]s0)= c4))‚Üî c5 = c1))

  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)

thm grplrinv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3)))))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3))))
  rspcedvd(s1, c1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3)), wa(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), c3)))
  grpinvcl(c0, cv(s0), c1, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), wb(wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3)), wa(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), c3))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))))
  oveq1(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3, co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s0), c2)
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), c3))
  grplinv(c0, cv(s0), c1, cfv(cminusg, c0), c2, c3)
  grprinv(c0, cv(s0), c1, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0))), c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(s0)), c2, cv(s0)), c3)

thm grpidinv2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  jca31(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), c3))))
  grplid(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  grprid(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  mpan9(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), c3))), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), c3)))))
  grplrinv(hs0, s0, c0, c2, c4, c3)
  rspcv(hs0, c1, c2, wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), c3))))
  rexbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), c3)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), c3)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), c3, co(cv(s0), c4, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0), c4)
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), c3, co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c4, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(c1, c4, cv(s0)), c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(((c3[c4]c1)= c1 ‚àß(c1[c4]c3)= c1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c2,((s0[c4]c1)= c3 ‚àß(c1[c4]s0)= c3))))

}

blocks.content: A group has a left and right identity element, and every member has a left and right inverse. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2006.) (Revised by AV, 1-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpidinv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, c1, cfv(c0g, c0), wcel(c0, cgrp), wral(s1, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))), wral(s1, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0)))))))
  grpidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wb(wral(s1, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))), wral(s1, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0))))))))
  ralbidv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wa(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))), wa(wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1), co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0), cv(s1), c2)
  rexbidv(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  eqeq2(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0), co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))
  eqeq2(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0))))))
  grpidinv2(s2, c0, cv(s1), c1, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s0)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c1, wa(wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0)))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(c0g, c0), c2, cv(s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s2, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, c0)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c0)
  diff.c0g.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cgrp)
  diff.cgrp.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c0g, c0)
  diff.c0g.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: grpinvid
blocks.content: The inverse of the identity element of a group. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), c2), wceq(co(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), c2), c2))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(co(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), c2), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  grplid(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  mpd3an23(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), c2), wceq(co(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), c2), c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  grpidcl(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  grpinvid1(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvid(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí(c1 ` c2)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 ` c2)= c2, (c2[(+ ` c0)]c2)= c2)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c2[(+ ` c0)]c2)= c2, c2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  grplid(c0, c2, (Base ` c0), c2, (+ ` c0))
  mpd3an23(c0 ‚àà Grp, ((c1 ` c2)= c2 ‚Üî(c2[(+ ` c0)]c2)= c2), c2 ‚àà(Base ` c0), c2 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  grpidcl(c0, c2, (Base ` c0))
  grpinvid1(c0, c2, (Base ` c0), c2, c1, (+ ` c0), c2)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: grplcan
blocks.content: Left cancellation law for groups. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm grplcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3)), wceq(c1, c3))
  3imp2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wi(wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  exp53(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3)), wceq(c1, c3))
  3eqtr3d(c1, c3, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c1)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c3)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3))))
  adantl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c1)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c3))))
  oveq2(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5)
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c1)), c1))
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c1)), c1))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c1)), c1, co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), c5, c1), co(cfv(c0g, c0), c5, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c2)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), c5, c1, cfv(c0g, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c2)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  anassrs(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), c5, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c1))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), c5, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c1))), w3a(wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpass(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2, c4, c1, c5)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c5, c1), c1))
  grplid(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c0), c5)
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, c5, c3)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c3)), c3))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c3)), c3))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c3)), c3, co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), c5, c3), co(cfv(c0g, c0), c5, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), c5, c3, cfv(c0g, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  grplinv(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0), c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, c4), c5, c3), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c5, co(c4, c5, c3))), w3a(wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpass(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2, c4, c3, c5)
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c5, c3), c3))
  grplid(c0, c3, c2, cfv(c0g, c0), c5)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  oveq2(c1, c3, c4, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grplcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c4[c5]c1)=(c4[c5]c3)‚Üî c1 = c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  impbid1((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c5]c1)=(c4[c5]c3), c1 = c3)
  3imp2(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((c4[c5]c1)=(c4[c5]c3)‚Üí c1 = c3))
  exp53(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c4[c5]c1)=(c4[c5]c3), c1 = c3)
  3eqtr3d(c1, c3, (((invg ` c0)` c4)[c5](c4[c5]c1)), (((invg ` c0)` c4)[c5](c4[c5]c3)), (((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚àß(c4[c5]c1)=(c4[c5]c3)))
  adantl(((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c5]c1)=(c4[c5]c3), (((invg ` c0)` c4)[c5](c4[c5]c1))=(((invg ` c0)` c4)[c5](c4[c5]c3)))
  oveq2((c4[c5]c1), (c4[c5]c3), ((invg ` c0)` c4), c5)
  adantr(((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c5]c1)=(c4[c5]c3), (((invg ` c0)` c4)[c5](c4[c5]c1))= c1)
