  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ((c3[c4]c1)=(c5[c4]c1)‚Üî c3 = c5), c0 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  grpidcl(c0, c5, c2)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  grprcan(c0, c3, c2, c5, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: grpinvinv
blocks.content: Double inverse law for groups. Lemma 2.2.1(c) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1), wceq(co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c1)))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c1), cfv(c0g, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), cfv(c0g, c0)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  grprinv(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  grplinv(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c1)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c2, c3)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  grplcan(c0, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c2, c1, cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 `(c3 ` c1))= c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 `(c3 ` c1))= c1, ((c3 ` c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3 `(c3 ` c1)))=((c3 ` c1)[(+ ` c0)]c1))
  eqtr4d(((c3 ` c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3 `(c3 ` c1))), ((c3 ` c1)[(+ ` c0)]c1), (0 ` c0), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((c3 ` c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3 `(c3 ` c1)))=(0 ` c0), (c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  grprinv(c0, (c3 ` c1), c2, (+ ` c0), c3, (0 ` c0))
  grplinv(c0, c1, c2, c3, (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (((c3 ` c1)[(+ ` c0)](c3 `(c3 ` c1)))=((c3 ` c1)[(+ ` c0)]c1)‚Üî(c3 `(c3 ` c1))= c1), c0 ‚àà Grp, (c3 `(c3 ` c1))‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2)
  syldan(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3 `(c3 ` c1))‚àà c2, (c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, (c3 ` c1), c2, c3)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  grplcan(c0, (c3 `(c3 ` c1)), c2, c1, (c3 ` c1), (+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: grpinvcnv
blocks.content: The group inverse is its own inverse function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvcnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(ccnv(c1), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(ccnv(c1), c1, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  simprd(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), c2, c2))
  f1ocnv2d(hs1, hs0, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), c2, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  grpinvcl(c0, cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  grpinvcl(c0, cv(hs1), c2, c1)
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  grpinvid1(c0, cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  grpinvid2(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1), c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  eqcom(cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  cnveqd(c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  feqmptd(hs0, c1, c2, c2, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  feqmptd(hs1, c1, c2, c2, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpinvf(c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cgrp))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cgrp))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvcnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí `' c1 = c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(`' c1, c1, `'(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs0)), (hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs1)), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  simprd(c0 ‚àà Grp, `'(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs0))=(hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs1)), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs0)): c2 ‚Üî c2))
  f1ocnv2d(hs1, hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs0)), c2, c2, (c1 ` hs1), (c1 ` hs0), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs0)))
  grpinvcl(c0, hs0, c2, c1)
  grpinvcl(c0, hs1, c2, c1)
  3bitr4g((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2)), hs0 =(c1 ` hs1), hs1 =(c1 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs1)= hs0, (c1 ` hs0)= hs1)
  3expb(c0 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2, ((c1 ` hs1)= hs0 ‚Üî(c1 ` hs0)= hs1))
  bitr4d((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2), (c1 ` hs1)= hs0, (c1 ` hs0)= hs1, (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)=(0 ` c0))
  3com23(c0 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2, ((c1 ` hs1)= hs0 ‚Üî(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)=(0 ` c0)))
  grpinvid1(c0, hs1, c2, hs0, c1, (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  grpinvid2(c0, hs0, c2, hs1, c1, (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqcom(hs0, (c1 ` hs1))
  eqcom(hs1, (c1 ` hs0))
  cnveqd(c1, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` hs0)), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  feqmptd(hs0, c1, c2, c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  feqmptd(hs1, c1, c2, c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  grpinvf(c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((c1 ` hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ` hs1))
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà Grp)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Grp)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: grpinv11
blocks.content: The group inverse is one-to-one. (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinv11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cminusg, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  ex(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  3eqtr3d(c1, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2))))
  fveq2(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), c0)
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), c1), wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3))
  grpinvinv(c4, c1, c3, c0)
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), c2), wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(c2, c3))
  grpinvinv(c4, c2, c3, c0)
  fveq2(c1, c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinv11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)‚Üî c1 = c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(invg ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  impbid1(w0, (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), c1 = c2)
  ex(w0, (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), c1 = c2)
  3eqtr3d(c1, c2, (c0 `(c0 ` c1)), (c0 `(c0 ` c2)), (w0 ‚àß(c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)))
  adantl(w0, (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c0 ` c1))=(c0 `(c0 ` c2)))
  fveq2((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c2), c0)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c0 ` c1))= c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 `(c0 ` c1))= c1, c4 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c3)
  grpinvinv(c4, c1, c3, c0)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c0 ` c2))= c2)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 `(c0 ` c2))= c2, c4 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà c3)
  grpinvinv(c4, c2, c3, c0)
  fveq2(c1, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: grpinvf1o
blocks.content: The group inverse is a one-to-one onto function. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cminusg, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1))
  mpbird(w0, wfn(ccnv(c0), c1), wfn(c0, c1))
  ffnd(c0, c1, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  grpinvf(c2, c0, c1)
  fneq1d(ccnv(c0), c1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(ccnv(c0), c0), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  grpinvcnv(c2, c0, c1)
  dff1o4(c0, c1, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üî c1))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(invg ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Grp)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üî c1), c0[Fn]c1, `' c0[Fn]c1)
  mpbird(w0, `' c0[Fn]c1, c0[Fn]c1)
  ffnd(c0, c1, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c1), c2 ‚àà Grp)
  grpinvf(c2, c0, c1)
  fneq1d(`' c0, c1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, `' c0 = c0, c2 ‚àà Grp)
  grpinvcnv(c2, c0, c1)
  dff1o4(c0, c1, c1)
}

blocks.name: grpinvnz
blocks.content: The inverse of a nonzero group element is not zero. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvnz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)), wne(cfv(c4, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wne(cfv(c4, c1), c3))
  necon3d(c1, c3, cfv(c4, c1), c3, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wceq(c1, c3))
  3eqtr3d(c1, c3, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c4, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c3)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c4, c3)))
  fveq2(cfv(c4, c1), c3, c4)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1))
  grpinvinv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c3), c3))
  grpinvid(c0, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvnz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚â† c3)‚Üí(c4 ` c1)‚â† c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  3impia(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚â† c3, (c4 ` c1)‚â† c3)
  necon3d(c1, c3, (c4 ` c1), c3, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  ex((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` c1)= c3, c1 = c3)
  3eqtr3d(c1, c3, (c4 `(c4 ` c1)), (c4 ` c3), ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ` c1)= c3))
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` c1)= c3, (c4 `(c4 ` c1))=(c4 ` c3))
  fveq2((c4 ` c1), c3, c4)
  adantr((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` c1)= c3, (c4 `(c4 ` c1))= c1)
  grpinvinv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c4 ` c1)= c3, (c4 ` c3)= c3)
  grpinvid(c0, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: grpinvnzcl
blocks.content: The inverse of a nonzero group element is a nonzero group element. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvnzcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wne(cfv(c4, c1), c3))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  eldifi(c1, c2, csn(c3))
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)

blocks.name: grpinvpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), they have the same group inversion function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c1)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c1), cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), crio(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))), cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), crio(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))), w0)
  3eqtr3d(cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), crio(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))), cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, c1), crio(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))), cmpt(s1, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))), cmpt(s1, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))), crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))), w0)
  riotabidva(s0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  anass1rs(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  mpteq12dv(s1, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0), crio(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0))), w0)
  riotaeqdv(s0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  mpteq12dv(s1, c2, crio(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))), cfv(cbs, c1), crio(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1))), w0)
  riotaeqdv(s0, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  grpinvfval(s1, s0, cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0)

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cplusg, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c0)

  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(invg ` c0)=(invg ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((invg ` c0), (invg ` c1), (s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚Ü¶ iota(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))), (s1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚Ü¶ iota(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))), w0)
  3eqtr3d((s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚Ü¶ iota(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))), (s1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚Ü¶ iota(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))), (s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))), (s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c2, iota(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)), iota(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)), w0)
  riotabidva(s0, c2, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0), (s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))
  anass1rs(w0, s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c2, ((s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)‚Üî(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)))
  eqeq12d((s0[(+ ` c0)]s1), (0 ` c0), (s0[(+ ` c1)]s1), (0 ` c1), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))
  adantr(w0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), (0 ` c0)=(0 ` c1))
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  mpteq12dv(s1, c2, iota(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)), (Base ` c0), iota(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0)), w0)
  riotaeqdv(s0, c2, (Base ` c0), w0, (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(0 ` c0))
  mpteq12dv(s1, c2, iota(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)), (Base ` c1), iota(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1)), w0)
  riotaeqdv(s0, c2, (Base ` c1), w0, (s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(0 ` c1))
  grpinvfval(s1, s0, (invg ` c0), (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), (0 ` c0), c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))
  grpinvfval(s1, s0, (invg ` c1), (Base ` c1), (+ ` c1), (0 ` c1), c1)
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  eqid((invg ` c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, s1 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cplusg, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cplusg, c1)
  diff.cplusg.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c1)
  diff.c0g.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c1)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: grpidssd
blocks.content: If the base set of a group is contained in the base set of another group, and the group operation of the group is the restriction of the group operation of the other group to its base set, then both groups have the same identity element. (Contributed by AV, 15-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpidssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c1), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))))
  rspc2va(s0, s1, cfv(c0g, c1), c2, cfv(c0g, c1), c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))
  eqeq12d(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2))
  grplid(c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c2, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c0))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sseldd(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  grpidcl(c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c2)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  grpidlcan(c0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, c1)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c1)
  diff.cplusg.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)), co(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cplusg, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cplusg, c1)
  diff.cplusg.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c1)
  diff.c0g.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: grpinvssd
blocks.content: If the base set of a group is contained in the base set of another group, and the group operation of the group is the restriction of the group operation of the other group to its base set, then the elements of the first group have the same inverses in both groups. (Contributed by AV, 15-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  ex(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0)))
  3eqtrd(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), c0), cfv(c0g, c2), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  syl21anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), c1), wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))))
  rspc2va(s0, s1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), c1, c0, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), c0)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))
  eqeq12d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c2), c0), cfv(c0g, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  grplinv(c2, c0, c1, cfv(cminusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqtr2d(cfv(c0g, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), cfv(c0g, c3), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  syl2an2r(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), cfv(c0g, c3)), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  grplinv(c3, c0, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cminusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(c0g, c3))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(c0g, c2)))
  grpidssd(s0, s1, c3, c2, c1, w0)
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), cfv(cplusg, c3), c0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0))), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  sseldd(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cbs, c3), c1, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), c1), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  grpinvcl(c2, c0, c1, cfv(cminusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c2))
  syl2an2r(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c3, cgrp), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  grpinvcl(c3, c0, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cminusg, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c3))
  sselda(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), w0)
  grprcan(c3, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), c0), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c0), c0, cfv(cplusg, c3))

  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cgrp))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm grpsubf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚Üí(c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Üí c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  sylib(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Üí c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))‚àà c2)))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, c0 ‚àà Grp, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))‚àà c2)
  3expb(c0 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))‚àà c2)
  syld3an3(c0 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))‚àà c2, ((invg ` c0)` hs1)‚àà c2)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2, ((invg ` c0)` hs1)‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, hs1, c2, (invg ` c0))
  grpcl(c0, hs0, c2, ((invg ` c0)` hs1), (+ ` c0))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1)), c2, c1)
  grpsubfval(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c0)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Grp)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà Grp)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: grpsubrcan
blocks.content: Right cancellation law for group subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpsubrcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c3, c5, c4)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c3, c5, c4)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c3, c5, c4)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)))))
  eqeq12d(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c3, c5, c4), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  3adant2(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))))
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))))
  grpsubval(c3, c2, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3ad2antr3(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  grprcan(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpsubrcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c1[c5]c4)=(c3[c5]c4)‚Üî c1 = c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c1[c5]c4)=(c3[c5]c4), c1 = c3, (c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4))=(c3[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4)))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), ((c1[c5]c4)=(c3[c5]c4)‚Üî(c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4))=(c3[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4))))
  eqeq12d((c1[c5]c4), (c3[c5]c4), (c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4)), (c3[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4)), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  3adant2(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c1[c5]c4)=(c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4)))
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c4, c5, (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c0)
  3adant1(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c3[c5]c4)=(c3[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4)))
  grpsubval(c3, c2, c4, c5, (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c0)
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4))=(c3[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c4))‚Üî c1 = c3), c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, ((invg ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  simpr2(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  3ad2antr3(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((invg ` c0)` c4)‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c4, c2, (invg ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))
  grprcan(c0, c1, c2, c3, ((invg ` c0)` c4), (+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: grpinvsub
blocks.content: Inverse of a group subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1), cfv(c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c3))), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c3))), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), co(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c3))), co(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  grpinvadd(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c4, c3), c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c1), c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3)), c3))
  grpinvinv(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  fveq2d(c4, co(c1, c5, c3), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c3))))
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c3, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4, c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c3, c5, c1), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c1))))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c3, c5, c1), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c4, c1))))
  grpsubval(c3, c2, c1, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c4 `(c1[c5]c3))=(c3[c5]c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(-g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c4 `(c1[c5]c3)), (c3[c5]c1), (c4 `(c1[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c3))), (c3[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c1)), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  eqtrd((c4 `(c1[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c3))), (c3[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c1)), ((c4 `(c4 ` c3))[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c1)), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syld3an3(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 `(c1[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c3)))=((c4 `(c4 ` c3))[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c1)), (c4 ` c3)‚àà c2)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 ` c3)‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  grpinvadd(c0, c1, c2, (c4 ` c3), c4, (+ ` c0))
  oveq1d((c4 `(c4 ` c3)), (+ ` c0), (c4 ` c1), c3, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 `(c4 ` c3))= c3)
  grpinvinv(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  fveq2d(c4, (c1[c5]c3), (c1[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c3)), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[c5]c3)=(c1[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c3)))
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c3, c5, (+ ` c0), c4, c0)
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c3[c5]c1)=(c3[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c1)))
  ancoms(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c3[c5]c1)=(c3[(+ ` c0)](c4 ` c1)))
  grpsubval(c3, c2, c1, c5, (+ ` c0), c4, c0)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: grpinvval2
blocks.content: A ~ df-neg -like equation for inverse in terms of group subtraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), co(c4, c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  eqtr2d(cfv(c3, c1), co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, c1))), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  grpsubval(c4, c2, c1, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3, c0)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  grplid(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c2, c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ` c1)=(c4[c5]c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(-g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(invg ` c0)

} = {
  eqtr2d((c3 ` c1), (c4[c5]c1), (c4[(+ ` c0)](c3 ` c1)), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c4[c5]c1)=(c4[(+ ` c0)](c3 ` c1)), c4 ‚àà c2)
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  grpsubval(c4, c2, c1, c5, (+ ` c0), c3, c0)
  syldan(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c4[(+ ` c0)](c3 ` c1))=(c3 ` c1), (c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c3)

  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: grpsubid
blocks.content: Subtraction of a group element from itself. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpsubid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c3, c1), c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c1))))
  anidms(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c1))))
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c1, c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  grprinv(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpsubid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c3]c1)= c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1[c3]c1), c4, (c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c1)), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[c3]c1)=(c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c1)))
  anidms(c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[c3]c1)=(c1[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c1)))
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c1, c3, (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c0)
  grprinv(c0, c1, c2, (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c4)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))
}

blocks.name: grpsubid1
blocks.content: Subtraction of the identity from a group element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpsubid1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c1, c3, c4), c1, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c1, c3, c4), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  id(wcel(c1, c2))
  grpidcl(c0, c4, c2)
  grpsubval(c1, c2, c4, c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  oveq2d(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c4, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c4), c4))

  syld3an3(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3)), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c2))

  3adant2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c2))

blocks.content: Cancellation law for group subtraction ( ~ npncan2 analog). (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpnpncan0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, co(c3, c4, c1)), c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, co(c3, c4, c1)), c6, co(c1, c4, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, co(c3, c4, c1)), co(c1, c4, c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpnpncan(c0, c1, c2, c3, c1, c4, c5)
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c4, c1), c6))
  grpsubid(c0, c1, c2, c4, c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpnpncan0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c1[c4]c3)[c5](c3[c4]c1))= c6)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(-g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c1[c4]c3)[c5](c3[c4]c1)), c6, (c1[c4]c1), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[c4]c3)[c5](c3[c4]c1))=(c1[c4]c1), c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  simprr(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  simprl(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  grpnpncan(c0, c1, c2, c3, c1, c4, c5)
  adantrr(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[c4]c1)= c6)
  grpsubid(c0, c1, c2, c4, c6)
}

blocks.name: grpnnncan2
blocks.content: Cancellation law for group subtraction. ( ~ nnncan2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpnnncan2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(co(c3, c5, c4), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c5, co(co(c3, c5, c4), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c3, c5, c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c3, c5, c4), c2))
  grpsubcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  grpsubsub4(c0, c1, c2, c4, co(c3, c5, c4), c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  oveq2d(c1, c5, co(co(c3, c5, c4), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), c3, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c4), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), c3))
  grpnpcan(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpnnncan2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c1[c5]c4)[c5](c3[c5]c4))=(c1[c5]c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c1[c5]c4)[c5](c3[c5]c4)), (c1[c5]c3), (c1[c5]((c3[c5]c4)[(+ ` c0)]c4)), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[c5]c4)[c5](c3[c5]c4))=(c1[c5]((c3[c5]c4)[(+ ` c0)]c4)), c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c3[c5]c4)‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  simpr3(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)
  3adant3r1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c3[c5]c4)‚àà c2)
  grpsubcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  grpsubsub4(c0, c1, c2, c4, (c3[c5]c4), c5, (+ ` c0))
  oveq2d(c1, c5, ((c3[c5]c4)[(+ ` c0)]c4), c3, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  3adant3r1(c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, ((c3[c5]c4)[(+ ` c0)]c4)= c3)
  grpnpcan(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: dfgrp3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a group as semigroup (with at least one element) which is also a quasigroup, i.e. a magma in which solutions ` x ` and ` y ` of the equations ` ( a .+ x ) = b ` and ` ( x .+ a ) = b ` exist. Theorem 3.2 of [Bruck] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 28-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: dfgrp3e
blocks.content: Alternate definition of a group as a set with a closed, associative operation, for which solutions ` x ` and ` y ` of the equations ` ( a .+ x ) = b ` and ` ( x .+ a ) = b ` exist. Exercise 1 of [Herstein] p. 57. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.) (Revised by AV, 28-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, c3, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c3))

  mptfvmpt(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))), cbs, c4)
  mpteq2dv(s0, c1, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c0))

blocks.name: grplactf1o
blocks.content: The left group action of element ` A ` of group ` G ` maps the underlying set ` X ` of ` G ` one-to-one onto itself. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 18-Mar-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)

thm grplactf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wf1o(cfv(c3, c1), c2, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wf1o(cfv(c3, c1), c2, c2), wceq(ccnv(cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(c3, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c1))))
  grplactcnv(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cminusg, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cminusg, c0)
  diff.cminusg.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cminusg, c0)
  diff.cminusg.s(s1)
}

thm grpsubpropd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(-g ` c0)=(-g ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((-g ` c0), (-g ` c1), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` hs1))), w0)
  eqtrd((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` hs1))), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚Ü¶(hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` hs1))), w0)
  mpt2eq3dva(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1)), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` hs1)), w0)
  eqtrd((hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1)), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` hs1)), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c0)` hs1)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))
  syl12anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))=(hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c0)` hs1)), w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, ((invg ` c0)` hs1)‚àà c2)
  simp1(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  eleqtrrd(hs0, c2, (Base ` c0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))
  simp2(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  eleqtrrd(((invg ` c0)` hs1), c2, (Base ` c0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), ((invg ` c0)` hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp, hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  simp3(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  grpinvcl(c0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (invg ` c0))
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), c2 =(Base ` c0))
  oveqrspc2v(s0, s1, hs0, c2, ((invg ` c0)` hs1), c2, (+ ` c0), (+ ` c1), w0)
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))=(hs0[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` hs1)))
  oveq2d(hs0, (+ ` c1), ((invg ` c0)` hs1), ((invg ` c1)` hs1), w0)
  fveq1d((invg ` c0), hs1, (invg ` c1), w0)

  grpsubfval(hs0, hs1, (-g ` c0), (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c0)

blocks.name: grp1
blocks.content: The (smallest) structure representing a _trivial group_. According to Wikipedia ("Trivial group", 28-Apr-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trivial_group ) "In mathematics, a _trivial group_ is a group consisting of a single element. All such groups are isomorphic, so one often speaks of _the_ trivial group. The single element of the trivial group is the identity element". (Contributed by AV, 28-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm grp1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), csn(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0g, c2)))))
  mnd1(c0, c1, c2)
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0g, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2), c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  df-ov(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), c0), wcel(cop(c0, c0), universe))
  opex(c0, c0)
  fvsng(cop(c0, c0), universe, c0, c1)
  mnd1id(c0, c1, c2)
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0g, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2)), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2))))
  ralsng(hs1, c0, c1, wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0g, c2))), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2))))
  rexbidv(hs0, csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0g, c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0g, c2), co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  rexsng(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cfv(c0g, c2), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  isgrp(hs1, hs0, c2, csn(c0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cfv(c0g, c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  grpbase(csn(c0), universe, c2, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cfv(cplusg, c2)), wcel(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), universe))
  snex(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0))

thm grp1inv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cminusg, c2), cres(cid, csn(c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), csn(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))))
} = {
  mpd(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cminusg, c2), cres(cid, csn(c0))), wf(cfv(cminusg, c2), csn(c0), csn(c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wf(cfv(cminusg, c2), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  grp1(c0, c1, c2)
  grpinvf(c2, cfv(cminusg, c2), csn(c0))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  grpbase(csn(c0), universe, c2, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))

blocks.name: imasgrp
blocks.content: The image structure of a group is a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm imasgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cgrp))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

  3eqtr4d(co(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c5, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), c5, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs2))), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4))))

  eleqtrd(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c3), c4, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4))))

  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4)), wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  grpass(c3, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3), cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c3))
  oveq123d(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c5, cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs2), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4))))

  oveqd(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c3)))
  eqidd(cv(hs2), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4))))
  oveq123d(cv(hs0), c5, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c3), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(hs2)), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4))))
  eqidd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4))))
  oveqd(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c3), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), c4))))

  eleqtrrd(c2, c4, cfv(cbs, c3), w0)

thm mhmlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(cfv(c0, c1), c4, cfv(c0, c3))))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mp3and(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(cfv(c0, c1), c4, cfv(c0, c3))), w0, wcel(c1, c5), wcel(c3, c5))
  id(w0)

blocks.name: mhmmnd
blocks.content: The image of a monoid ` G ` under a monoid homomorphism ` F ` is a monoid. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: mhmfmhm
blocks.content: The function fulfilling the conditions of ~ mhmmnd is a monoid homomorphism. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)

thm mhmfmhm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c0, c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmnd))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl21anbrc(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd), w3a(wf(c0, c3, c6), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c2))))
  mhmmnd(s0, s1, c2, c3, c0, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  3jca(w0, wf(c0, c3, c6), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c2)))
  syl(w0, wf(c0, c3, c6), wfo(c0, c3, c6))
  fof(c0, c3, c6)
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c3, w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  3expb(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  mhmid(s0, s1, c0, cfv(c0g, c1), c2, c3, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  ismhm(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c4, c5, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))

  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0g, c1)

blocks.name: ghmgrp
blocks.content: The image of a group ` G ` under a group homomorphism ` F ` is a group. This is a stronger result than that usually found in the literature, since the target of the homomorphism (operator ` O ` in our model) need not have any of the properties of a group as a prerequisite. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ghmgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4, cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c2, c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
